definition[0]: a group of people who represent a company, organization etc
example[0]: A trade delegation will visit Kuwait.
example[1]: the head of the American delegation to the United Nations
definition[1]: the process of giving power or work to someone else so that they are responsible for part of what you normally do
definition[2]: a group of people who officially represent a company, organization, government etc
example[4]: A delegation of British business executives has arrived in Cuba for trade talks.
example[5]: The company’s chief executive led a powerful delegation to today’s meeting.
definition[3]: the process of giving part of your power or work to someone else, usually someone in a lower position than you
